name: THE DESTROYER [TALL]
description:
Winter 2013/2014 release 
The DESTROYER is a jet black tall hood.

These have been completely custom manufactured to our exact specifications. We've created them from scratch and every material and stitch line was chosen by us.

These garments are created to be longer yet stay fitted, although created for the snow and riding lifestyle they are fully city proof. 
THESE WILL NOT BE STANDARD SIZES SO PLEASE CHECK.

Size Guide 
S/M (under 5'10) - 82cm (length) x 53cm (width) 
L/XL (5'11+) - 90cm (length) x 58cm (width) 
XXL (6'2+) - 100cm (length) x 68cm (width)

NEVER wear any Entirety garment in a quiet room. 
www.entiretyclothing.co.uk

name: Beyond Limited : Aztec Palms / 1 LEFT
description:
Selected from our world travels, these photographs were taken in Cambodia.

There are only 5 in this range so be quick to pick one up!

Once you've purchased, there will be no other person with same design. Each pocket is a one off, individual, single print and hand finish stitching.

Sex : Uni
Wash : 40ºC
Limited Edition : Beyond Limited
Warning : Do not wear in a quiet room
_______________________________________________

We use local printers and all of our stock is hand finished. We put an extreme amount of time & effort in providing our customers with great quality, unique garments with an edge, we honestly can't thank you enough for supporting us. Everything purchased from Entirety goes back into the company to help us build further and strengthen our foundations.

We seriously appreciate and love feedback and photos.

Contact us
Instagram : @entirety / #entirety 
Facebook : www.facebook.com/entiretyclothing
Email : entiretyclothing@gmail.com

Returns Policy 
If you are not entirely delighted with the products that you have chosen you may return them to us within 1 month with printed email confirmation of your purchase. We will be more than happy to offer you an exchange or, at our option, a refund provided that the products are returned complete, in perfect condition, unused, and with the original packaging.
